features: 🌿 For All Skin Types - The essence-like texture has concentrated active ingredients. The product is dermatologically tested and verified as a zero-irritation product. The toner perfectly absorbs into the skin without being sticky and can replace the cream, or can be applied after the cream

🌿 Essential Ingredient, Milk Vetch Root Extract: Deeply easily absorbed into the skin and sufficiently moisturizing thaan purified water. Plus, the isoflavonoids in Milk Vetch Root Extract improves skin elasticity and skin barrier and enhancing the skin's naatural radiance. The balances of oil and moisture level protects against damage and stress of skin.

🌿 ONLY 7 ESSENTIAL INGREDIENTS FOR HEALTHY SKIN - We harvests only bare, essential, natural ingredients, carefully formulated to help your skin rediscover youth. We believe cosmetics is a protecting the skin so that we have opted to remove all unnecessary chemical substances from their products to utilize only the minimum, safest components to protect and provide respite to your tired and irritated skin

🌿 CONDENSED TEXTURE SUITABLE FOR DRY AND COMBINATION SKIN TYPES - The toner has an essence-like dense texture and concentrates active ingredients into the product. The product is dermatologically tested and verified as a zero-irritation product. The toner perfectly absorbs into the skin without being sticky and can replace the cream, or can be applied after the cream

🌿 Why Pyunkang Yul? - Along with know-how recipe of Pyunkang Yul Eastern Medicine Clinic, specialized inhelping skin and respiratory diseases for about 50 years, the toner helps calm angry skin comfortably by carefully selected ingredients found in nature and rigorous testing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deep Mega Hydration. Manufacturer Sealed, Both Sides, Top&Bottom
reviews.reviewText: Will be an absolutely amazing addition to my skincare! And a lightweight moisturizer in the dry & crazy 110% Arizona weather! K Beauty & J Beauty are way ahead of us, has saved my skin!When my skin barrier is compromised/ sensitive, I don't want to become allergic to skincare ingredients like Peptides, Bakuchiol, or any other helpful ingredients because my skin is sensitive and overreactive! It happens to a lot of people, whether on Tretinoin or too much AHA/BHA, and I don't want to be that person!So many Educating Dermatologists recommended this on YouTube! So excited. I really needed an effective hydrator with *simple* ingredients when my skin barrier is compromised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am 70 years old, but because I’ve taken good care of my skin, I could pass for being in my 50s. This toner is very moisturizing and nice on my skin. After I wash my face in the morning, I put a little bit in the palm of my hand, and then apply it on my face. In the evening, especially if I’ve worn make up, I use a cotton pad to apply to my face to remove any remaining residue. Since the cotton pad absorbs some of the toner, you need to use a little more than you would in the morning. I’m glad I bought it and I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this toner for about 2 1/2 weeks and I love it! I’ve never used a toner before but after my dermatologist recommend I use one, I found this one. It’s so hydrating! I pair this with the PYUNKANG YUL Low pH Pore Deep Cleansing Foam and the pyunkang yul calming barrier moisture cream. They work perfectly together. This toner has no smell. It’s not very slimy. It’s more watery than slimy but don’t let the thickness throw you off! This is such a simple product but it does what it needs to do! I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Tonic with a Serum feel
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed it but it has a more serum consistency than a toner alcoholy feel, even ones that are alcohol free. Using cotton balls with this product is kinda tricky and I find myself using a lot more. However when I put the product on my fingers it's okay. I still use it and very much enjoy it the feel afterwards. I have somewhat sensitive skin and it didn't break out my skin in any way. I'll most likely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ran out of my toner and decided to give this one a try. I like it. The texture is like gel and water. It is very cleansing which I like. The only thing is that I wish it had more moisture in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and hydrating.
reviews.reviewText: Very hydrating product. Love using it after washing my face. Does not help with texture or fine lines but it does provide hydration and my skin looks and feels supple and hydrated. Great for dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooo good. I’m in love
reviews.reviewText: At first I didn’t know if I liked this toner. But now I am in love with it. It’s so simple and hydrating and I love that it has a viscous texture. It is my FAVORITE toner. Pls don’t ever change it or stop selling it ❤️❤️❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works for me tbh
reviews.reviewText: After years of use, I can honestly say that it hydrates my skin, saving me money on moisturizer because I need less now. Have and will continue to recommend to others.
Leí reseñas y no mintieron disminuye la apariencia del poro y la piel super hidratada aparte super rendidor. Esta marca es buenaza
Like my expetation, very wort it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this product! Soft skin after using, no any mask effect or sticky filling after using! This is my 5th bottle 🔥❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Het hydrateert, ik gebruik het pas, maar ik vind het al goed.
